Title: Timer - Operations
Description: Verify start/stop functionality and elapsed time
Preconditions: User is logged in and has a task
Steps: Click Start Timer button on a task.

Title: Export - CSV Download
Description: Verify time tracking data export functionality
Preconditions: User is logged in and has recorded time

Title: Time Accumulation - Done/InProgress
Description: Verify time accumulation does not duplicate

Title: Time Accumulation - Done/InProgress
Steps: Start timer on the task and wait 2 seconds.

Title: Time Accumulation - Done/InProgress
Steps: Move task back to 'In Progress' column.

Title: Time Accumulation - Done/InProgress
Steps: Start timer again and wait 2 seconds.
